title: Perplexity AI + Helicone
description: Introducing the integration of Perplexity AI with Helicone's observability platform. This integration enables comprehensive monitoring and analytics for Perplexity's powerful language models, including their Sonar and Sonar Pro models. Leverage Helicone's advanced observability features to track costs, monitor performance, and optimize your Perplexity AI implementations while maintaining full visibility into your model interactions and usage patterns.
